title: Behance Jobs Scraper
description: Extract job listings from Behance. Behance job pages are rendered client-side, so this actor uses a browser crawler (Playwright) with optional sitemap fallback for reliability.

startUrl.title: Start URL (Optional)
startUrl.description: Start scraping from a specific Behance joblist URL. If provided, this overrides keyword/location filters.

startUrls.title: Start URLs (Optional)
startUrls.description: Optional list of URLs to start from. Each URL can be a listing page (/joblist?page=...) or a job detail page (/joblist/<id>/...).

mode.title: Mode
mode.description: Crawl strategy. Use 'auto' for normal keyword/location scraping. Use 'sitemap' to skip listing pages and crawl job URLs discovered from the Behance jobs sitemap.

keyword.title: Search Keyword
keyword.description: Job title or keyword to search for (e.g., 'Graphic Designer', 'UX Designer', 'Illustrator', 'Creative Director').

location.title: Location
location.description: Filter jobs by location (e.g., 'New York', 'San Francisco', 'Remote', 'London').

collectDetails.title: Scrape Full Job Details
collectDetails.description: Enable to visit each job page and extract complete descriptions. Disable for faster scraping with basic info only.

results_wanted.title: Maximum Results
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of job listings to scrape. Set higher for comprehensive data collection.

max_pages.title: Maximum Pages to Scrape
max_pages.description: Limit the number of listing pages to process (safety cap to prevent excessive requests).

maxConcurrency.title: Max Concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: Maximum number of parallel browser pages.

blockAssets.title: Block Heavy Assets
blockAssets.description: Blocks images/fonts/media to speed up crawling.

useSitemapFallback.title: Fallback To Sitemap If Listing Fails
useSitemapFallback.description: If the first listing page renders no job links (common during blocks), the actor will enqueue job URLs from the Behance jobs sitemap.

sitemapLimit.title: Sitemap URL Limit
sitemapLimit.description: Maximum number of job URLs to load from the sitemap (used by sitemap mode / sitemap fallback).

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings for requests. Residential proxies recommended for Behance to avoid rate limiting.
